input_args.text: '  A cathedral founded on pure faith, and its creator who has dedicated more than 50 years of his life to building it. 91-year-old Don Justo, of the small Spanish town of Mejorada del Campo, is a former monk. On a whim and a dream, he decided to build a monumental house of God, and since 1961, he has been doing just that – using junk, recycled building materials, and as much good will as he can find. For his single minded determination, some say he’s a madman, and others, a saint.
